package.name: accelerated_vadd_publisher_once
package.description:
A trivial vector-add ROS 2 publisher that adds two inputs to a vector and publishes only once. Vector add operations are offloaded into to the FPGA.
This example is meant only for FPGA-evaluation purposes. See "accelerated_vadd_publisher" for a publisher that continuously publishes.
The offloading operation into the FPGA (or to the Programmable Logic (PL)) allows the publisher to meet its targeted rate (10 Hz). See "vadd_publisher" for a version running purely on the CPUs which fails to maintain the publication rate.
package.author: Víctor Mayoral Vilches
